TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CreateParams extends System.Object

summary.span: 封装创建控件时所需的信息。

span.span: Encapsulates the information needed when creating a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的信息可用于传递有关控件初始状态和外观的信息。The information in a can be used to pass information about the initial state and appearance of a control. 大多数 派生控件重写 属性以传入适当的值，或在 中包含附加信息。Most derived controls override the property to pass in the appropriate values or include additional information in the . 有关创建控件参数的详细信息，请参阅 MSDN Library 中的 Windows Platform SDK 参考中的 `CreateWindow` 和 `CreateWindowEx` 函数和 `CREATESTRUCT` 结构文档。For more information about creating control parameters, see the `CreateWindow` and `CreateWindowEx` functions and the `CREATESTRUCT` structure documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located in the MSDN Library. > [!NOTE] > 用于设置 、和 属性的常量是在 Winuser.h 头文件中定义的。The constants used to set the , , and properties are defined in the Winuser.h header file. 此文件由平台 SDK 或 Visual Studio 安装。This file is installed by the Platform SDK or Visual Studio. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个名为 `MyIconButton` 的 派生类，并提供按钮显示图标而不是图像所需的实现。The following code example creates a derived class named `MyIconButton` and provides the implementation needed for the button to display an Icon rather than an Image. 扩展 属性，并将一个值添加到 属性中，该属性会使按钮显示 而非 。The property is extended and a value added to the property that causes the button to display an rather than an . [!code-cpp[CreateParams#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CreateParams/CPP/createparams.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CreateParams#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CreateParams/CS/createparams.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CreateParams#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CreateParams/VB/createparams.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例创建标准 控件的实例和在上述示例中创建的派生控件的实例 `MyIconButton`。The following code example creates an instance of a standard control and an instance of the derived control, `MyIconButton`, created in the example above. 此示例要求在与应用程序相同的位置中有一个名为 Default 的 文件。This example requires that there is an file named Default.ico in the same location as the application. 当应用程序启动时，"`Default`" 图标将显示在 "`MyIconButton`" 按钮上。When the application starts, the `Default` icon is displayed on the `MyIconButton` button. 如果 `Default` 图标不存在，则按钮表面为空白。If the `Default` icon is not present, the button face is blank. 单击标准 时，将出现一个 框，以便您可以选择要在 `MyIconButton`上显示的新图标。When the standard is clicked, an box will appear so you can select a new Icon to display on the `MyIconButton`. [!code-cpp[CreateParams#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CreateParams/CPP/createparams.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CreateParams#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CreateParams/CS/createparams.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CreateParams#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CreateParams/VB/createparams.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置从中派生该控件的 Windows 类的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the Windows class to derive the control from.

value.span: 从中派生该控件的 Windows 类的名称。

span.span: The name of the Windows class to derive the control from.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值为 `null`，指示该控件不是从现有控件类派生的。The default value for this property is `null`, indicating that the control is not derived from an existing control class. 若要从现有控件类派生，请将系统类名称存储在此属性中。To derive from an existing control class, store the system class name in this property. 例如，若要从标准 控件派生，请将此属性设置为 "BUTTON"。For example, to derive from the standard control, set this property to "BUTTON".

summary.span: 获取或设置类样式值的按位组合。

span.span: Gets or sets a bitwise combination of class style values.
A bitwise combination of the class style values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 属性不为 `null`，则将忽略 属性。The property is ignored if the property is not `null`. 有关创建控件参数的详细信息，请参阅 MSDN Library 中的 Windows Platform SDK 参考中的 `CreateWindow` 和 `CreateWindowEx` 函数和 `CREATESTRUCT` 结构文档。For more information about creating control parameters, see the `CreateWindow` and `CreateWindowEx` functions and the `CREATESTRUCT` structure documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located in the MSDN Library. > [!NOTE] > 用于设置 、和 属性的常量是在 Winuser.h 头文件中定义的。The constants used to set the , , and properties are defined in the Winuser.h header file. 此文件由平台 SDK 或 Visual Studio 安装。This file is installed by the Platform SDK or Visual Studio.

summary.span: 获取或设置扩展窗口样式值的按位组合。

span.span: Gets or sets a bitwise combination of extended window style values.

value.span: 扩展窗口样式值的按位组合。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the extended window style values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性支持应用于控件的扩展外观和初始状态值。The property supports extended appearance and initial state values to apply to the control. 有关创建控件参数的详细信息，请参阅 MSDN Library 中的 Windows Platform SDK 参考中的 `CreateWindow` 和 `CreateWindowEx` 函数和 `CREATESTRUCT` 结构文档。For more information about creating control parameters, see the `CreateWindow` and `CreateWindowEx` functions and the `CREATESTRUCT` structure documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located in the MSDN Library. > [!NOTE] > 用于设置 、和 属性的常量是在 Winuser.h 头文件中定义的。The constants used to set the , , and properties are defined in the Winuser.h header file. 此文件由平台 SDK 或 Visual Studio 安装。This file is installed by the Platform SDK or Visual Studio.

value.span: 存放创建控件所需附加参数信息的 。

span.span: The that holds additional parameter information needed to create the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要创建多文档界面（MDI）客户端窗口，则 属性必须引用 `CLIENTCREATESTRUCT` 结构。If you are creating a multiple document interface (MDI) client window, the property must reference a `CLIENTCREATESTRUCT` structure. 有关创建控件参数的详细信息，请参阅 MSDN Library 中的 Windows Platform SDK 参考中的 `CreateWindow` 和 `CreateWindowEx` 函数和 `CLIENTCREATESTRUCT` 结构文档。For more information about creating control parameters, see the `CreateWindow` and `CreateWindowEx` functions and the `CLIENTCREATESTRUCT` structure documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located in the MSDN Library.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性控制控件的外观及其初始状态。The property controls the appearance of the control and its initial state. 有关创建控件参数的详细信息，请参阅 MSDN Library 中的 Windows Platform SDK 参考中的 `CreateWindow` 和 `CreateWindowEx` 函数和 `CREATESTRUCT` 结构文档。For more information about creating control parameters, see the `CreateWindow` and `CreateWindowEx` functions and the `CREATESTRUCT` structure documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located in the MSDN Library. > [!NOTE] > 用于设置 、和 属性的常量是在 Winuser.h 头文件中定义的。The constants used to set the , , and properties are defined in the Winuser.h header file. 此文件由平台 SDK 或 Visual Studio 安装。This file is installed by the Platform SDK or Visual Studio. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个名为 `MyIconButton` 的 派生类，并提供按钮显示图标而不是图像所需的实现。The following code example creates a derived class named `MyIconButton` and provides the implementation needed for the button to display an icon rather than an image. 扩展 属性，并将一个值添加到 属性中，该属性会使按钮显示 而非 。The property is extended and a value added to the property that causes the button to display an rather than an . [!code-cpp[CreateParams#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CreateParams/CPP/createparams.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CreateParams#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CreateParams/CS/createparams.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CreateParams#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CreateParams/VB/createparams.vb#1)]
